item.title: Open the GW4E Perspective
item.description:
Select in the menubar at the top of the workbench Window->Perspective->Open Perspective->Other ...
In the opened window select "GW4E Perspective" and click OK.
These steps change the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for GW4E development.

item.title: Create the project
item.description:
Before creating a graph and use the GW4E features, we need a project to put it in. Close any opened editors and project.
In the main toolbar, select in the menubar at the top of the workbench File->New->GW4E Project.
Enter gwproject1 for the project name,
click Next,
click Next,
select None,
click Next,
click Finish
In the Package Explorer, you can see the newly created project.
